summary: This appears to be an email containing a travel itinerary and schedule for meetings in Europe, including an Ordinary General Meeting of shareholders. The document references locations in Italy and Switzerland and includes travel dates in April 2001.

events.title: Trip from Berlingen to Bologna
events.description: Travel from Berlingen to Bologna, staying at Hotel Mao.

events.title: Ordinary General Meeting
events.description: Ordinary General Meeting of shareholders for Fing'n (Europe) AO AGr at Hotel Lago di Lugano, followed by a Management meeting.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 4, 2021, containing a travel itinerary from April 2001.
The itinerary details a trip from Los Angeles to Europe, with stops in Berlingen, Bologna, and Lugano.
A key event is an Ordinary General Meeting of shareholders for 'Fing'n (Europe) AO AGr' held at Hotel Lago di Lugano on April 24, 2001.
The email subject references '[EXTERNAL EMAIL] - Pics', but the body contains no named individuals.
The travel involves multiple hotel stays in Italy and Switzerland over a period from April 17 to April 26, 2001.
